item.title: OpenSource Writeup
item.author: vymvn
item.description: Summary This machine’s theme is that it is an opensource file transfer app, where one user can upload a file and they would get a URL they can share with others to download. Vulnrabilites in the code made it possible for an attacker to upload a backdoor and get command execution on a Docker container. Where the attacker could then pivot to a filtered Gitea service and log in to one of the users using found credentials in a previous commit in the git repository.
